description:
Michitaka believes Yoshitaka relationship has gone stale and tries to help.   Afterwards he needs some help with lady troubles of his own. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yoshitaka and the Daughter of Minamoto no Yasumitsu: Fujiwara no Yoshitaka / Ko no Naishi and Michitaka: The Mother of Gido Sanshi
Yoshitaka to Minamoto no Yasumitsu no Musume: Fujiwara no Yoshitaka / Kou no Naishi to Michitaka: Gidou Sanshi no Haha
義孝と源保光の娘 藤原義孝 / 高内侍と道隆 儀同三司母
